mapper.select: SELECT bno, btitle, bcontent, bdate, mid FROM board WHERE bno=#{bno}
mapper.insert: INSERT INTO board (bno, btitle, bcontent, bdate, mid) VALUES(SEQ_BNO.nextval, #{btitle}, #{bcontent}, SYSDATE, #{mid})
mapper.update: UPDATE board SET btitle=#{btitle}, bcontent=#{bcontent} WHERE bno=#{bno}
